author: Naomi O’Leary
title: Coronavirus an opportunity for Beijing to usher in Chinese century
description: Europe Letter: With the West in decline and China rising, old certainties are crumbling
content:
It is difficult to know the future implications of a moment in history while you are still living through it.
But one of the most striking indications that the pandemic will be a historical marker must be the hints from Saudi authorities that they may cancel… [+4805 chars]
